net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.panel

Interface UiWidgetGridRow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractValidatableObject, Accessibility, AttributeReadAriaRole, AttributeReadDisposed, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadHtmlId, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadMode, AttributeReadModeFixed, AttributeReadModified, AttributeReadPrimaryStyle, AttributeReadStyles, AttributeReadStylesAdvanced, AttributeReadTooltip, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeReadVisibleRecursive, AttributeWriteDisposed, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteHtmlId, AttributeWriteId<String>, AttributeWriteMode, AttributeWriteModeFixed, AttributeWritePrimaryStyle, AttributeWriteStyles, AttributeWriteStylesAdvanced, AttributeWriteTooltip, AttributeWriteVisible, AttributeWriteVisibleAdvanced, UiFeature, UiFeatureEvent, UiFeatureMessages, UiFeatureMode, UiWidget, UiWidgetAbstractComposite, UiWidgetComposite<UiWidgetGridCell>, UiWidgetDynamicComposite<UiWidgetGridCell>, UiWidgetDynamicPanel<UiWidgetGridCell>, UiWidgetMultiComposite<UiWidgetGridCell>, UiWidgetNative, UiWidgetPanel<UiWidgetGridCell>, UiWidgetRegular, UiWidgetRegularComposite<UiWidgetGridCell>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetGridRow, UiWidgetGridRowGwt, UiWidgetGridRowTestImpl

    public interface UiWidgetGridRow
extends UiWidgetDynamicPanel<UiWidgetGridCell>, UiWidgetNative
    This is the interface for a a dynamic panel that represents a row of a UiWidgetGridPanel and consists of cells.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • addChild

        UiWidgetGridCell addChild(UiWidgetRegular child)
        This method creates a UiWidgetGridCell, sets the given child and adds it to this row.
        ATTENTION:
        If the given child is a UiWidgetField, this method will also attach the label before. This is done on purpose for convenience. If you want to prevent this, create a UiWidgetGridCell directly and set the UiWidgetField directly before you add it.
        Parameters:
        child - is the child to add.
        Returns:
        the UiWidgetGridCell.
        See Also:
        #addChild(UiWidgetGridCell)

      • addChildren

        UiWidgetGridCell addChildren(UiWidgetRegular... children)
        This method creates a UiWidgetGridCell, sets the given children composed to a single widget and adds it to this row.
        Parameters:
        children - are the children to add.
        Returns:
        the UiWidgetGridCell.
        See Also:
        #addChild(UiWidgetGridCell), UiWidgetGridCell.setChildren(UiWidgetRegular...)
